comment: This collaboration is great. The scent is fabulous. Ordering and delivery was simple and easy. Thank you!

name: User name
comment: Checkout was easy to navigate, communication and updates came just frequently enough, shipping was quick and the final product was even better than I expected! My only regret is not ordering more before they sold out!

name: User name
comment: Berries and cream and brown butter latte are my favourite!!! But they all smell amazing. The sounds of the wood wick is also nice.
